sn22.131:1.2: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.131:1.4: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.131:2.1: “Reverend, an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand the origin, the ending, the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.131:2.7: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
